title: Teaching
text:
Graduate-level course covering experimental design, sequencing, and bioinformatics for agricultural microbiomes.



Hands-on course introducing microbiome sampling, DNA extraction, sequencing, and data analysis.

title: Research
text:
We identify and isolate core beneficial gut microbes using high-throughput culturing and metagenomics, with applications in probiotic development and gut health optimization.



We investigate virulence mechanisms, host immune responses, and tissue-level pathology to understand bacterial pathogenesis and vaccine targets.



We develop rapid detection and monitoring tools integrating genomics, machine learning, and sensor-based systems for poultry health.
